title: “Get Mitch Or Die Trying.” (LIVE from Denver)
description: The House votes to condemn the President’s racism, Mitch McConnell’s job and the Senate are up for grabs in 2020, and Governor Jared Polis joins Jon, Jon, Tommy, Dan, and Erin Ryan on stage in Denver, Colorado. Check out: votesaveamerica.com/getmitch
author: hey@crooked.com (Crooked Media)
